algorithms.label: Бързо Сортиране
algorithms.information: Quick Sort is a widely known and highly efficient algorithm for sorting large datasets. It has a complexity of O(n log n) which makes it a common choice for most sorting scenarios, but it worst case scenario could be O(n^2) if not implemented properly. It recursively splits an array into smalled subarrays based on a pivot
